activeToDos.title: Active tasks
activeToDos.info: This is the list of your current tasks with validity dates. You can set up to 5 current tasks. You can remove, resolve or reorder the list with drag and drop.
activeToDos.emptyList: List of your todos is empty. Add your first item below!

archivedToDos.title: Archived tasks
archivedToDos.info: This is the list of your archived tasks. Table is sortable and pageable.
archivedToDos.emptyList: List of your archived todos is empty. Item will show up once it is resolved or it expires.!

createDialog.title: Create new to do
createDialog.dataSavedLocally: Current data has been saved in browser storage
createDialog.formInfo: Saving will be available after all form errors are fixed
